reactor.tcp.encoding

Class DelimitedCodec<IN,OUT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • reactor.tcp.encoding.DelimitedCodec<IN,OUT>
  • Type Parameters:
    IN - The type that will be produced by decoding
    OUT - The type that will be consumed by encoding
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Codec<reactor.io.Buffer,IN,OUT>

    public class DelimitedCodec<IN,OUT>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Codec<reactor.io.Buffer,IN,OUT>
    An implementation of Codec that decodes by splitting a Buffer into segments based on a delimiter and encodes by appending its delimiter to each piece of output. During decoding the delegate is used to process each segment. During encoding the delegate is used to create a buffer for each piece of output to which the delimiter is then appended.

      Create a delimited codec using the given delimiter and using the given Codec as a delegate.
      DelimitedCodec(Codec<reactor.io.Buffer,IN,OUT> delegate)
      Create a line-feed-delimited codec, using the given Codec as a delegate.
